authority-number.hint: For example, 16/B/D/001. Your authority number can be found at the bottom left of your authority letter.
authority-number.label: Current authority number

reference-number.label: Customer reference number
reference-number.hint: Your customer reference number can be found at the top left of your authority letter.

organisation.legend: What type of organisation is the authority for?

weapons-ammunition.legend: What will be handled under the authority?
weapons-ammunition.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.

obtain.legend: How will the prohibited items be obtained?
obtain.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.

wont-take-possession.label: The prohibited items won't be taken into possession

other-means-details.summary: How will the prohibited items be acquired through other means?
other-means-details.label: How will the prohibited items be obtained?

import.legend: Will any of the prohibited items be imported?
import.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.
import.summary: Will the prohibited items be imported?

import-country.summary: Which countries will the prohibited items be imported from?
import-country.label: Which countries will the prohibited items be imported from?

stored-on-premises.legend: Will the prohibited items be stored on the business's premises in the UK?
stored-on-premises.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information on your existing authority, so enter the details of all business premises that will be used to store the prohibited items.

no-storage-details.label: Provide further details, including whether or not the prohibited items will be stored with third parties

usage.legend: What business activities will be carried out with the prohibited items?
usage.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.

transfer.label: Transferring (directing the movement of items through third parties)

arm-guards.label: Providing armed guards to protect ships

other-details.label: Provide further details. This can include TV film or theatrical productions, humane dispatch of animals and protection against animals, for example.

weapons-types.legend: Which sections do the weapons or components fall under?
weapons-types.important: Only in certain circumstances, such as transporting prohibited items under seal, should you select the unspecified option or leave the maximum quantity questions blank.

fully-automatic.label: Fully automatic or burst-fire weapons - Section 5(1)(a)

self-loading.label: Self-loading or pump-action rifles and carbines but not pistols - Section 5(1)(ab)

short-pistols.label: Short firearms pistols and revolvers - Section 5(1)(aba)

short-self-loading.label: Short self-loading or pump-action shotguns - Section 5(1)(ac)

air-rifles.label: Air rifle, air gun or air pistol for use with self-contained gas cartridge - Section 5(1)(af)

fire-noxious-substance.label: Weapons which fire noxious substances - Section 5(1)(b)

disguised-firearms.label: Firearms disguised as other objects - Section 5(1A)(a)

military-use-rockets.label: Rockets/ammunition with exploding missiles for military use - Section 5(1A)(b)

projecting-launchers.label: Launchers or projecting apparatus for use with the rockets or ammunition detailed above - Section 5(1A)(c)

weapons-unspecified-details.label: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of prohibited items being handled.

ammunition-types.legend: Which sections does the ammunition fall under?

explosive-cartridges.label: Cartridges designed to explode, noxious ammunition, grenades, bombs or rockets fired from firearms - Section 5(1)(c)

incendiary-missile.label: Ammunition for military use which has an incendiary missile - Section 5(1A)(d)

armour-piercing.label: Ammunition for military use which has an armour-piercing missile - Section 5(1A)(e)

expanding-missile.label: Ammunition which has an expanding missile - Section 5(1A)(f)

missiles-for-above.label: Actual missiles (projectiles) for all the above ammunition - Section 5(1A)(g)

ammunition-unspecified-details.label: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of prohibited items being handled.

authority-holders.legend: How many individuals will be named on the authority?
authority-holders.warning: If the details you provide here are different to those on your existing authority, the details on your existing authority will be replaced.
authority-holders.hint: You can have up to two authority holders. They will be responsible for ensuring the business operates within the limitations of the authority.

contact-holder.legend: Who do we contact about this application?
contact-holder.warning: The contact details you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.

someone-else-name.label: What is that person's full name?

contact-holder.first: Which address should we use to contact {{values.first-authority-holders-name}}?
contact-holder.second: Which address should we use to contact {{values.second-authority-holders-name}}?

use-different-address.hint: You should only use a home address if it's the business' registered address.

invoice-postcodeOrZIPCode.label: Postcode or ZIP Code
invoice-postcodeOrZIPCode.changeLinkDescription: Your current postcode or ZIP Code

purchase-order.legend: Do you have a purchase order?

storageAddresses-add-another.legend: Is there another address where the prohibited items will be stored?
storageAddresses-add-another.hint: The police will inspect each address used for storage
storageAddresses-add-another.warning: The information you provide here will replace the information we currently hold.

storage-postcodeOrZIPCode.label: Postcode or ZIP Code
storage-postcodeOrZIPCode.changeLinkDescription: Your current postcode or ZIP Code

contact-postcodeOrZIPCode.changeLinkDescription: Your current postcode or ZIP Code

authority-holder-contact-postcodeOrZIPCo.changeLinkDescription: Your current postcode or ZIP Code
